ONSITE: BOSTON, MA : Several positions at ClimaCell

ClimaCell is a weather technology company with positions open for Product Managers, R&D Meteorologists, QA Engineers, and others. We are the first company with block-by-block short-term weather forecasts. We generate weather data from wireless networks and provide HD weather maps and an API to customers across the weather-sensitive economy.

https://www.climacell.co/careers for more information and to apply. Send questions to Sophia Tupolev-Luz, Chief of Staff: info@climacell.co
